00342 VL_EXPORT
00343 void vl_set_alloc_func (void *(*malloc_func)  (size_t),
00344                         void *(*realloc_func) (void*, size_t),
00345                         void *(*calloc_func)  (size_t, size_t),
00346                         void  (*free_func)    (void*))
00347 {
00348   vl_malloc_func  = malloc_func ;
00349   vl_realloc_func = realloc_func ;
00350   vl_calloc_func  = calloc_func ;
00351   vl_free_func    = free_func ;
00352 }

00354 VL_EXPORT
00355 void
00356 vl_set_printf_func (printf_func_t printf_func)
00357 {
00358   vl_printf_func  = printf_func ? printf_func : do_nothing_printf ;
00359 }
00360 
00361 #ifdef VL_OS_WIN
00362 LARGE_INTEGER tic_freq ;
00363 LARGE_INTEGER tic_mark ;
00364 #else
00365 clock_t tic_mark ; 
00366 #endif
00367 
00372 void vl_tic()
00373 {
00374 #ifdef VL_OS_WIN
00375   QueryPerformanceFrequency(&tic_freq) ;
00376   QueryPerformanceCounter(&tic_mark) ;
00377 #else
00378   tic_mark = clock() ;
00379 #endif
00380 }
00381 
00394 double vl_toc()
00395 {
00396 #ifdef VL_OS_WIN
00397   LARGE_INTEGER toc_mark ;
00398   QueryPerformanceCounter(&toc_mark) ;
00399   return (double) (toc_mark.QuadPart - tic_mark.QuadPart) / tic_freq.QuadPart ;
00400 #else
00401   return (double) (clock() - tic_mark) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC ;
00402 #endif
00403 }
